title: Portfolio App
discover: Discover my skills, projects, and more.
about_me_content: I am Maher Boughdiri, a dedicated Full Stack Developer and Technical Support Specialist. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I bring creative solutions and technical excellence to every project. My journey in tech started in Tunisia, where I developed a passion for problem-solving and innovative thinking. Today, I leverage my skills to build robust, user-friendly applications and provide top-notch technical support. Whether coding a new feature or troubleshooting an issue, I thrive in dynamic environments and love turning complex challenges into opportunities for growth and learning.
